thread.title: BRIEF-Purple Innovation Files Shelf For Issuance Of Co's Class A Common Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Purple Innovation Files Shelf For Issuance Of Co's Class A Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-purple innovation files shelf for issuance of co

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Purple Innovation Inc:
* PURPLE INNOVATION FILES SHELF FOR ISSUANCE OF 14.2 MILLION SHARES OF COâ€˜S CLASS A COMMON STOCK ISSUABLE UPON EXERCISE OF OUTSTANDING WARRANTS
* PURPLE INNOVATION - SHELF ALSO RELATES TO THE RESALE OF ABOUT 6.6 MILLION SHARES OF CO'S CLASS A COMMON STOCK BY SELLING STOCKHOLDERS Source text: ( bit.ly/2GdDZHE ) Further company coverage:
